message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000.  I'm confident this is a fair starting point for negotiations. What are your thoughts?
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer. While I see the value of the product, $14,000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, however, $9,500 is quite a bit lower than I can accept.  Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $11,750?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value you place on the product, $11,750 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10,500, which is a good compromise. I'm confident this price is fair for both of us.
